Points.Objects2: #XY,5808,421,20;*balron/bodyvalue/86/hue/200/name/an ophidian jailer/ATTACH/<XmlDeathAction/action/@SETONTHIS/MSG/You'll never free that traitorousss sssnake! ; SETONTHIS/MSG/*Bites jail key into pieces* ; SETONNEARBY,12,*,PlayerMobile/ATTACHMENT,xmlvalue,demergo,value/2>:MX=1:SB=1:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=SETONTHIS/freerun/true:MX=1:SB=1:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=WHILE/GETONSPAWN,1,COUNT=1/20:MX=2:SB=3:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=SETVAR,test/{RND,1,30}:MX=1:SB=20:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=IF/{GETVAR,test}=1/21/22:MX=1:SB=20:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=SETONSPAWN,1/SAY/Die, human ssscum!:MX=1:SB=21:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=IF/{GETVAR,test}=2/23/24:MX=1:SB=22:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=SETONSPAWN,1/SAY/You'll rue the day you crossssed me!:MX=1:SB=23:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=IF/{GETVAR,test}=3/25/26:MX=1:SB=24:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=SETONSPAWN,1/SAY/You will pay for your insssolence!:MX=1:SB=25:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=:MX=1:SB=6:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=:MX=1:SB=6:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0 :OBJ=SETONTHIS/running/false/sequentialspawn/0/freerun/false:MX=1:SB=6:RT=0:TO=0:KL=0
